version_description:
Thanks for playing! Take a look at what changed:

• A big new Side Job
• Boosts! Recharge all containers on the playing field in one go with the new booster item. 
• Hard to choose a gem pack? The store has pre-packaged discount offers!
• Improvement: Better visibility on Orders
• Improvement: Now you'll get the helpful alert when there's no place left on the playing field.
• Optimization: Performance should be improved all around and especially on older devices.
• Optimizations & Bug Fixes

We’re back with new stuff!

• Sell max level containers if you have more than one of the same type.
• See all rewards you got from Hot Plates with the new beautiful animation.
• Open containers by just tapping on them.
• Behind the scenes changes for stability & performance.

MAJOR UPDATE

• Merge Inn Season 2 has arrived! A big set of new items and levels!
• Daily Challenges: Available after completion in Season 1.
• Behind the scenes changes for stability and performance.

To access the new levels just keep playing as usual. To go back use the "Seasons" button.

Thanks for playing Merge Inn! If you have questions please write us at support@originalgames.io

We regularly update & optimize Merge Inn. In this update:

• Hot Plates: Updated rewards
• Items in shop sales have more useful variety. 
• Behind the scenes changes for stability and performance

Thanks for playing Merge Inn! If you have questions please write us at support@originalgames.io
